snippet: An independent panel appointed by the United Nations to investigate rights abuses in Syria said Wednesday that the government's armed forces and loyalist militias were responsible for the worst known atrocity in the conflict, the Houla massacre.
abstract: An independent panel appointed by the United Nations to investigate rights abuses in Syria said Wednesday that the government's armed forces and loyalist militias were responsible for the worst known atrocity in the conflict, the Houla massacre.

headline.main: U.N. Panel Blames Syrian Army and Militia for Houla Massacre
